118.title: Mike Pesca

episode of.title: The Opposition with Jordan Klepper (TV Series 2017– )

118.plot: Jordan celebrates the success of President Trump's meeting with Kim Jong-un, breaks down Dennis Rodman's role in the North Korean summit and chats with author Mike Pesca.

119.title: Hari Kondabolu

episode of.title: The Opposition with Jordan Klepper (TV Series 2017– )

119.plot: Jordan savors Trump's historic peace summit win, commissions a piece of art for the president's birthday and chats with comedian Hari Kondabolu.

120.title: Clint Watts

episode of.title: The Opposition with Jordan Klepper (TV Series 2017– )

120.plot: Jordan salutes the latest freethinkers running for office, helps America understand who Michael Cohen really is and chats with "Messing with the Enemy" author Clint Watts.

121.title: Dan Pfeiffer

episode of.title: The Opposition with Jordan Klepper (TV Series 2017– )

121.plot: Jordan breaks down President Trump's zero-tolerance immigration policy, Laura Grey chats with Senator Jeff Merkley, and Dan Pfeiffer discusses "Yes We (Still) Can."

122.title: Yeonmi Park

episode of.title: The Opposition with Jordan Klepper (TV Series 2017– )

122.plot: Jordan questions his trust in Fox News, answers questions from callers with Kobi Libii and sits down with human rights activist and "In Order to Live" author Yeonmi Park.

123.title: Karamo Brown

episode of.title: The Opposition with Jordan Klepper (TV Series 2017– )

123.plot: Jordan adds new foes to his lengthy enemies list, Josh Sharp and Aaron Jackson take down everything in their path, and Karamo Brown discusses "Queer Eye".

124.title: Cameron Esposito

episode of.title: The Opposition with Jordan Klepper (TV Series 2017– )

124.plot: Jordan recognizes America's small-town heroes, applauds Fox News pundit Jeanine Pirro's support for President Trump and sits down with comedian Cameron Esposito.

125.title: Richard Painter

episode of.title: The Opposition with Jordan Klepper (TV Series 2017– )

125.plot: Jordan questions the future of civil discourse, grapples with the ongoing changes in America and sits down with former White House ethics lawyer Richard Painter.

126.title: Lauren Duca

episode of.title: The Opposition with Jordan Klepper (TV Series 2017– )

126.plot: Jordan questions President Trump's honesty, sends Laura Grey and Niccole Thurman to investigate Mississippi's sole abortion clinic and chats with Teen Vogue's Lauren Duca.

127.title: Kim Gordon

episode of.title: The Opposition with Jordan Klepper (TV Series 2017– )

127.plot: Jordan sells products to help freethinkers fight the MSM without him, finds out why Niccole Thurman is leaving the Trump train and chats with musician and actress Kim Gordon.

128.title: The Final Fight

episode of.title: The Opposition with Jordan Klepper (TV Series 2017– )

128.plot: Jordan breaks news stories from the future, realizes that being on President Trump's team means supporting the "bad guys" and faces his enemies for one last fight.

imdb.title: The Opposition with Jordan Klepper
akas: The Opposition with Jordan Klepper (United States)
plot: In a TV news landscape where it's impossible to know whom to trust, one man rises above the partisan hackery of the mainstream media to bring you the truth that matters: his. From the mind of Jordan Klepper, this is The Opposition.
